## Publish
- [ ] Write ([template](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1d0j-NjC0GjpesETBTqkZQdPMUg0C2_0d71HRObKo7gE/edit?usp=sharing))
- [ ] Post to test/review
- [ ] Add reviews link to book
- [ ] Publish
- [ ] Delete doc
